casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Edward GOSS. No. 316A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 13, 2005. Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of June 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 12th day of September 2005 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the *667Court in conference this the 13th day of June 2005."
